name: LochlanKyte_Prototypes
description:
Challenge 1 Seasons: Press numbers 1 - 4 to change the seasons.  May take some time to load.

Challenge 2 Gravity: Move around with WASD and space to jump.

Challenge 3 Revenge Racing: Move around with arrow keys and R to reset when prompted.

Challenge 4 Tangibility: Use PC build for most of the functions such as switching the swords with 1-9 and clicking to make the sound effect.  For Android build swing the phone for sound.  However Android build may not work.
